Posts.Content: May 27, 2011 10:06PM JanBan wrote: I bought this book yesterday and quickly skimmed through it.  I did read the first 10 pages last night and the content looks promising.  I hope to decrease the amount of red meat that I eat and have more fish which I happen to love anyway.  I asked my oncologist (who is a breast cancer survivor) this morning about supplements and she said that she takes only calcium and vitamin D in addition to a nutritional diet containing many fruits and vegetables.
Posts.Title: Diet, suplements and Stage IV alicia_en_madrid K-Lo
